mapper.select: SELECT q.questionNo AS questionNo, q.userNo AS userNo, q.content AS content, q.uploadDate AS uploadDate, q.productNo AS productNo, u.userNo AS userNo, u.name AS userName, p.productNo AS productNo, p.name AS productName FROM question q LEFT JOIN user u ON q.userNo = u.userNo LEFT JOIN product p ON q.productNo = p.productNo
